data.name: Invoice_Get
data.value: SELECT DISTINCT 'Y' "#", OINV."DocEntry" "Id Doc", OINV."DocNum" "Nr Doc", OINV."Serial" "Nr NF", OINV."DocDate" "Data", OINV."Max1099" "Valor", OINV."Comments" "Observações" FROM OINV INNER JOIN INV1 ON INV1."DocEntry" = OINV."DocEntry" INNER JOIN INV12 ON INV12."DocEntry" = OINV."DocEntry" INNER JOIN ( SELECT INV1."DocEntry" FROM INV1 INNER JOIN OUSG ON OUSG.ID = INV1."Usage" AND OUSG."ThirdParty" = 'Y' AND INV1."VisOrder" = 0 )OUSG ON OUSG."DocEntry" = OINV."DocEntry" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CONS."U_DocEntry", CONS."U_LineNum", SUM(CONS."U_Quantity") "U_Quantity" FROM "@CVA_CONSIGNMENT" CONS GROUP BY CONS."U_DocEntry", CONS."U_LineNum" ) CONS ON CONS."U_DocEntry" = INV1."DocEntry" AND CONS."U_LineNum" = INV1."LineNum" WHERE IFNULL(CONS."U_Quantity", 0) < INV1."Quantity" AND ("CardCode" = '{0}' OR '{0}' = '') AND ("Serial" = {1} OR {1} = 0) AND OINV."DocDate" BETWEEN '{2}' AND '{3}' AND "CANCELED" = 'N'

data.name: Invoice_GetByCreditNote
data.value: SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM OINV WHERE "U_DocEntryDev" = {0} AND "CANCELED" = 'N'

data.name: Invoice_GetPendingItems
data.value: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'Y' "#", OINV."DocEntry", OINV."CardCode", OINV."DocNum", INV1."LineNum", INV1."TaxCode", INV1."WhsCode", INV1."Usage", INV1."Price", OINV."Serial" "Nr NF", INV1."ItemCode" "Item", INV1."Dscription" "Descrição", OCRD."CardCode" "Forn. Principal", OCRD."CardName" "Nome", OSCN."Substitute" "Nr. Catálogo PN", OUSG."Usage" "Utilização", 0.00 "Quantidade", IBT1."BatchNum" "Lote", IBT1."Quantity" - IFNULL(CONS."U_Quantity", 0.00) "Disponível", INV1."Price" * (IBT1."Quantity" - IFNULL(CONS."U_Quantity", 0.00)) "Valor", row_number () over (partition by INV1."DocEntry" ORDER BY INV1."DocEntry" asc , OSCN."Substitute" desc) as RN FROM OINV INNER JOIN INV1 ON INV1."DocEntry" = OINV."DocEntry" INNER JOIN OUSG ON OUSG."ID" = INV1."Usage" INNER JOIN OITM ON OITM."ItemCode" = INV1."ItemCode" LEFT JOIN OCRD ON OCRD."CardCode" = OITM."CardCode" LEFT JOIN OSCN ON OSCN."ItemCode" = OITM."ItemCode" AND OSCN."CardCode" = OCRD."CardCode" LEFT JOIN IBT1 ON IBT1."BaseEntry" = INV1."DocEntry" AND IBT1."BaseLinNum" = INV1."LineNum" AND IBT1."BaseType" = INV1."ObjType" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CONS."U_DocEntry", CONS."U_LineNum", CONS."U_BatchNum", SUM(CONS."U_Quantity") "U_Quantity" FROM "@CVA_CONSIGNMENT" CONS GROUP BY CONS."U_DocEntry", CONS."U_LineNum", CONS."U_BatchNum" ) CONS ON CONS."U_DocEntry" = INV1."DocEntry" AND CONS."U_LineNum" = INV1."LineNum" AND CONS."U_BatchNum" = IBT1."BatchNum" WHERE IBT1."Quantity" > IFNULL(CONS."U_Quantity", 0) AND OINV."DocEntry" IN ({0}) ) WHERE "RN" = 1
